message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high to me. How about we settle on $105?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $95. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
